name: freelanceforge
description: Decentralized freelance credential management system built on Polkadot

scripts.build:production: npm run build:substrate && npm run build:frontend:production
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:substrate
scripts.setup: npm run install:frontend && npm run build:substrate
scripts.deploy:production: npm run build:production && docker-compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml up --build -d
scripts.test:production: cd scripts && npm install && npm run test:production

author: FreelanceForge Team
